item.description:
Meet at Bradley Palmer Park main parking lot and walk/hike/snowshoe for about an hour. We'll walk arond the northern then eastern perimeter trail before winding our way up "the hill" then eventually back to the parking lot.

Main Parking Lot on B-P State Park Rd. Approx GPS: 42.653953, -70.907285

(If there's a better, more dog-friendly parking area and loop, we're open to suggestions!)

We're limiting the group to 10 bipeds and 5 quadrupeds (dogs)

Part two of the morning will find us visiting the MYOPIA dogsled races, link for detailed info below.

http://myopiasleddogr...

PLEASE note: Non-performing dogs (ie. non-sled dogs) will not be allowed on the grounds of Appleton Farm!
item.how_to_find_us: Red Van, German shepard and Black Lab
item.name: Bradley Palmer Park before checking out Sled dogs at Myopia
